name: Pink Onion
author: Sara H.
description: Small restaurant, amazing atmosphere. Call ahead for a reservation, but you can take a chance for bar seating. The couple that runs this place are the sweetest. They were so kind to us. We ordered a pizza and added three extra toppings (no extra charge) and a glass of wine. After we finished the glass one of them gave us a little more on the house. Such a nice place, not too loud not quiet. The pizza was so delicious. 100% would come back again.
